org.springframework.vault.config

Class AbstractVaultConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.vault.config.AbstractVaultConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Aware, ApplicationContextAware
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EnvironmentVaultConfiguration

    @Configuration
public abstract class AbstractVaultConfiguration
extends Object
implements ApplicationContextAware
    Base class for Spring Vault configuration using JavaConfig.
    Author:
    Spencer Gibb, Mark Paluch

    • Nested Class Summary

    • Method Detail

      • vaultEndpoint

        public abstract VaultEndpoint vaultEndpoint()
        Returns:
        Vault endpoint coordinates for HTTP/HTTPS communication, must not be null.

      • clientAuthentication

        public abstract ClientAuthentication clientAuthentication()
        Annotate with Bean in case you want to expose a ClientAuthentication instance to the ApplicationContext.
        Returns:
        the ClientAuthentication to use. Must not be null.

      • vaultTemplate

        @Bean
public VaultTemplate vaultTemplate()
        Create a VaultTemplate.
        Returns:
        the VaultTemplate.
        See Also:
        vaultEndpoint(), clientHttpRequestFactoryWrapper(), sessionManager()

      • sessionManager

        @Bean
public SessionManager sessionManager()
        Construct a LifecycleAwareSessionManager using clientAuthentication(). This SessionManager uses threadPoolTaskScheduler().
        Returns:
        the SessionManager for Vault session management.
        See Also:
        SessionManager, LifecycleAwareSessionManager, restOperations(), clientAuthentication(), ()

      • secretLeaseContainer

        @Bean
public SecretLeaseContainer secretLeaseContainer()
                                                throws Exception
        Construct a SecretLeaseContainer using vaultTemplate() and threadPoolTaskScheduler().
        Returns:
        the SessionManager for Vault session management.
        Throws:
        Exception
        See Also:
        vaultTemplate(), threadPoolTaskScheduler()

      • threadPoolTaskScheduler

        @Bean
public ThreadPoolTaskScheduler threadPoolTaskScheduler()
        Create a ThreadPoolTaskScheduler used by LifecycleAwareSessionManager and SecretLeaseContainer. Annotate with Bean in case you want to expose a ThreadPoolTaskScheduler instance to the ApplicationContext. This might be useful to supply managed executor instances or ThreadPoolTaskSchedulers using a queue/pooled threads.
        Returns:
        the ThreadPoolTaskScheduler to use. Must not be null.

      • restOperations

        public RestOperations restOperations()
        Construct a RestOperations object configured for Vault usage.
        Returns:
        the RestOperations to be used for Vault access.
        See Also:
        vaultEndpoint(), clientHttpRequestFactoryWrapper()

      • clientHttpRequestFactoryWrapper

        @Bean
public AbstractVaultConfiguration.ClientFactoryWrapper clientHttpRequestFactoryWrapper()
        Create a AbstractVaultConfiguration.ClientFactoryWrapper containing a ClientHttpRequestFactory . ClientHttpRequestFactory is not exposed as root bean because ClientHttpRequestFactory is configured with ClientOptions and SslConfiguration which are not necessarily applicable for the whole application.
        Returns:
        the AbstractVaultConfiguration.ClientFactoryWrapper to wrap a ClientHttpRequestFactory instance.
        See Also:
        clientOptions(), sslConfiguration()

      • clientOptions

        public ClientOptions clientOptions()
        Returns:
        ClientOptions to configure communication parameters.
        See Also:
        ClientOptions

      • sslConfiguration

        public SslConfiguration sslConfiguration()
        Returns:
        SSL configuration options. Defaults to SslConfiguration.NONE.
        See Also:
        SslConfiguration, SslConfiguration.NONE

      • getEnvironment

        protected Environment getEnvironment()
        Return the Environment to access property sources during Spring Vault bootstrapping. Requires ApplicationContext to be set.
        Returns:
        the Environment to access property sources during Spring Vault bootstrapping.

                           throws BeansException
